name: HTML Block with Highlighting
author: CSS Daily

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Open WordPress Admin, then Plugins > Add New
  2. Click Upload Plugin
  3. Upload the html-block-with-highlighting.zip file and click Install Now
  4. Click Activate Plugin
  5. Open the editor; for example in a new post or new page
  6. Open the new block type search
  7. Search for ‘Highlighting’ to find the HTML Block with Highlighting, then create a block of this type
  8. Happily edit HTML with syntax highlighting ðŸ™‚
sections.description: HTML Block with Highlighting is a WordPress plugin which adds a new HTML Block with syntax highlighting to the Gutenberg editor.

short_description: HTML Block with Highlighting is a WordPress plugin which adds a new HTML Block with syntax highlighting to the Gutenberg editor.
